text: The Philadelphia City Hall is a city hall in Philadelphia, United States. It is 167 meters (548 feet) tall and has 9 floors. It was built in 1901. Philadelphia City Hall was the tallest building in the world from 1901 to 1908. Before it was built, the tallest building in the world was Philadelphia City Hall. The Singer Building became the tallest seven year later. == Photo gallery == Image:City Hall holiday.jpg Image:Phila City Hall Twilight2.jpg Image:Phlcityhalldetail.jpg Image:Philadelphia City Hall-zoom.JPG Image:PhilaCityHallNight.JPG Image:Philadelphia City Hall (from Art Museum).JPG == Other websites == * City of Philadelphia City Hall official site * Site with a lot of information and pictures * Emporis.com - Philadelphia City Hall * SkyscraperPage.com - Philadelphia City Hall Category:Philadelphia Category:1901 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Pennsylvania
title: Philadelphia City Hall
